ygData.subject: Re: Damage calculation formulae
ygData.msgSnippet: damage is capped until you git lv20 its capped at 10 then 20 from wht I remember.. ... From: Beth Moursund  To:
ygData.messageBody:
damage is capped until you git lv20 its capped at 10 then 20 from wht I
remember..
----- Original Message -----
From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 26, 1999 5:19 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Damage calculation formulae


> From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>
> There's something else besides this going on in damage calculation. I
> started a dwarf cleric and twinked him with all of Windsong's backup armor
> plus a Midnight Mallet that I'd picked up from a troll. This is a magic
> 2hand blunt weapon with damage 14 delay 44. So it should do up to 29
> damage per (slow) hit. The dwarf frequently hits for 18, and (if I
> remember right) occasionally for 19, but I've never seen it hit for 20 or
> more.
>
> I'm getting about ready to ditch the Mallet for a faster weapon, just
> because it's not doing as much damage as it should.
>
> The dwarf has strength over 100 and 2H blunt skill over 50 now, by the
way.
>
> J. M., if you're reading this, I'd love it if you would explain what's
> happening here...
>
> - Beth "BethMo" Moursund
> player of Windsong Wanderer and Staar the Twinked
>
>
>
>
